North Korea has sent 6,700 containers of munitions to Russia, South Korea saysNorth Korea has shipped about 6,700 containers carrying millions of munitions to Russia since July to support its war against Ukraine, in a sign of ongoing arms transfers, South Korean media reported on Tuesday, citing the defence minister. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 08:37:12 GMT JLAJMD7DCFOV7FGE6NYWUIJS6M https://www.reuters.com/world/north-korea-has-sent-6700-containers-munitions-Russia-south-korea-says-2024-02-27/Hyonhee Shin世界
Alibaba's South Asian e-commerce giant Daraz announces layoffs in memoAlibaba-owned e-commerce platform Daraz Group has announced layoffs across the group to "adopt a more streamlined and agile structure", acting Chief Executive Officer James Dong said on Tuesday in an internal memo to employees reviewed by Reuters. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 06:49:54 GMT JUH35HLMHFI7TH4N5LA5Z26GBA https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/alibabas-south-asian-e-commerce-giant-daraz-announces-layoffs-memo-2024-02-27/Ariba Shahid商业零售与消费品
India's Apr-Jan steel imports at six-year high as China shipments surgeIndia's steel imports touched a six-year high in the first 10 months of the fiscal year to March, led by Chinese shipments, and India was a net importer of finished steel, according to provisional government data seen by Reuters on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 06:43:04 GMT 64SVY2ST5JPA3OIZVBAYQPZW6A https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/indias-apr-jan-steel-imports-six-year-high-china-shipments-surge-2024-02-27/Neha Arora市场商品
China wine dispute may be resolved in weeks, Australian trade minister saysA trade dispute with China over tariffs on Australian wine may be resolved "in a few weeks' time", Australian Trade Minister Don Farrell said on Tuesday, removing one of the final obstacles curbing its exports to China. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 06:11:07 GMT OZ7QV4RAIZMD5FPZRUGA62LIKI https://www.reuters.com/business/china-wine-dispute-may-be-resolved-weeks-australian-trade-minister-says-2024-02-27/Alasdair Pal商业
Vietnam plans union reform to avert trade woes, risking foreign firms' uneaseCommunist-ruled Vietnam is expected to ratify this year the UN convention for the free establishment of trade unions, UN officials and diplomats said, in a move meant to cut risks of trade disputes but likely leaving some foreign companies uneasy. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 04:04:52 GMT EP6PS2ZWIFO6VB2NTIDCOBGOV4 https://www.reuters.com/business/vietnam-plans-union-reform-avert-trade-woes-risking-foreign-firms-unease-2024-02-27/Francesco Guarascio可持续发展可持续财务与报告
China's COMAC to showcase C919, ARJ21 jets in 5 Southeast Asian countriesChinese state-owned planemaker COMAC will conduct flying displays of its C919 and ARJ21 jets in five Southeast Asian countries, it said on Tuesday, as it looks to lay the groundwork for future international sales. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 03:52:43 GMT YG2QKZCJV5KRPNAY5K4IU7KJKM https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/chinas-comac-showcase-c919-arj21-jets-5-southeast-asian-countries-2024-02-27/Sophie Yu, Brenda Goh商业航空航天与国防
Exclusive: StanChart suspends new offshore channel investments by China clientsStandard Chartered has suspended new investments by its clients in China into offshore products via a quota-based channel, the bank said, amid a surge in demand for overseas investments due to weakness in the local market and currency. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 02:21:55 GMT 5MQA7YKWIRIYBBYXJG4S5H5XDM https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/stanchart-suspends-new-investments-clients-via-chinas-outbound-channel-2024-02-27/Selena Li商业金融
Soaring Japanese equities offer investors cozy distance from troubled ChinaAs economic and geopolitical woes spur an exodus of investors from China, many have been redirecting money into Japan, giving the benchmark Nikkei an extra boost as it rockets to all-time highs. Asia shares wobble, traders on guard as Japanese inflation tops forecastAsian shares slipped on Tuesday, with slightly warmer-than-expected Japanese inflation putting investors on guard ahead of price data due in Europe and the U.S. this week, though bitcoin extended gains on signs that institutional buyers are circling. Taiwan says 5 China coast guard ships entered waters near frontline islandsFive Chinese coast guard ships entered prohibited or restricted waters around Taiwan's frontline islands of Kinmen on Monday but left shortly after being warned away, a Taiwan minister said on Tuesday amid a continued rise in tensions with Beijing.
